meanings.sent1: The forenenst house had a red door while ours had a blue one.
meanings.sent2: The two forenenst mountains stood tall against the clear sky.
meanings.sent3: The forenenst cats stared at each other, ready to pounce.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was forenenst to his frown, creating a stark contrast.
meanings.sent5: The forenenst colors of the rainbow painted a beautiful scene in the sky.

meanings.sent1: She placed the book forenenst the lamp on the table.
meanings.sent2: The car parked forenenst the building entrance.

meanings.sent5: The teacher stood forenenst the class, ready to start the lesson.

meanings.sent1: Her grades were forenenst her sister's, showing a clear difference.
meanings.sent2: The new model paled in comparison when placed forenenst the old one.
meanings.sent3: His speed on the track was forenenst the other runners, making him the winner.
meanings.sent4: The taste of the homemade pie was forenenst the store-bought one, much better.
